channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 20:18 Driven your alarm to the Sumy region.Creck on subsequent messages.
item.description: 🟢 20:18 Driven your alarm to the Sumy region.Creck on subsequent messages.#Sumy_oblast This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
